I order a reebok coat in purple and white. Amazon size said a medium. The coat came and it was to small. I called Amazon and asked for a large to be sent to replace the coat that was a medium and too small. Amazon sent me a replacement and that was a medium also. I have a broken back and can not drive to return these coats. I got a message saying not to worry about returning these items from the first representative I spoke with and the 2nd guy I spoke with it was completely opposite He acted like I was lying I called Amazon back and had a horrible experience trying get the right size of coat sent too me! The gentleman I spoke with was still trying to get me to return the coat and did not want to give me my money back to be able to order the proper size! I finally ordered a large and absolutely love this coat! As a valid customer I sure hope noone else has to deal with this! I do not appreciate the way I was treated!
Purchased the jacket as a gift for my niece,  she loved the fit feel and color.

评论概述: Beautiful mid season and winter jacket!
评论详情: Lightweight, colorful, high level and great quality. It looks and feels much more expensive. Attractive garment for the modern woman and very warm for winter days. Also very comfortable to wear open when it's not so cold. Highly recommended! Beautiful colors in matte/ocher shades.
